website_summaries.verdict: A nice design and a couple extra features keep the Nikon Coolpix S8000 from being an also-ran compact megazoom.
pros: 10x zoom in an attractive compact body
cons: no optical zoom while recording movies

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking, fast-acting
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for an earlier Coolpix camera. The features/buttons were the same, and the shutter speed and picture quality are much improved over my earlier camera. The only downside - battery life. My initial use was on a trip to Sweden, and I ran the battery down before the first full day of picture-taking. So, while I'd recommend the camera, I'd also say to buy a second battery to swap during a long day of sightseeing and picture taking!
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Nice Zoom
customer_reviews.text: The 10X zoom is the big selling point for me. The camera takes great pictures but there is one design flaw. Where you would naturally hold the camera in your hand, your left finger will always block the pop up flash. When the flash is needed you will need to hold the camera in an unusual way. The 720p video mode sounds nice but make no mistake, this is not a substitute for a real dedicated video camera. The zoom is very restricted in video mode and there is much shake. Video images are fair but not great unless it is just holding still on one subject. Other than that it is a nice digital.
customer_reviews.author: LT1

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for the Advanced Amateur
customer_reviews.text: This is a very capable camera that is still easy to use. Although I have not had a chance to use it much yet, the level of manual control when desired is impressive in a camera at this price point. When all you want to do is make some snapshots, the automatic controls make largely intellegent choices. With its high resolution sensor, I have made some cropped 13X19 prints and found no obvious noise or pixelation. I like that there are a large number of accessories available from manufacturers other than Nikon. This can offer great savings on high quality products that supplement the capabilities of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: started out as a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Nikon Coolpix s8000 in June of 2010 and used it during vacations and family get together times. While out West on vacation, I tried to turn on the camera to find nothing happening. It was frustrating and the problem became speradic where at times it would turn on by pushing the button and then other times, it wouldn't. Having two batteries, I tried both batteries to find that it occurred with each battery. I finally had to return the camera to Nikon Inc for repairs with an estimate cost of $97.00. I am waiting for the camera to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Baker

customer_reviews.title: tennisgrandma's thoughts
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived in great condition and on time. The pictures that I've taken have been of excellent quality, especially the telephoto shots. I'd been having trouble with the poor quality of the telephoto shots from the Canon that I had been using for a number of years, which is why I finally bought a new one. The Nikon didn't have any of the blur or out of focus on telephoto pictures that the Canon has, so I'm a very happy camper. The only quibble would be with the positioning of the pop up flash. I knew about that feature but bought the camera anyway and I guess I'll just have to get used to positioning my hand differently.
customer_reviews.author: bridgemaven

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S8000
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality isn't exactly as clear as it should be, for being NIKON. When I got the camera, the lens was defective with spots that were a part of the lens. Although you won't see it unless you look at it in the light. After a few months the picture screen and video started shaking. I sent it into a Nikon repair facility to fix the problem. They sent it back to me fixed and within a few months it started doing the same thing and worse. I do not recommend anybody to buy this piece of crap. There is NOTHING good about this camera. Needless to say I bought a Canon and JUNKED the Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F. Shippert

customer_reviews.title: Super deal on a great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb value for this camera. The quality of this Nikon model, as far as a point-and-shoot, far surpasses any other camera in its class. As far as the price, I don't know how the vendor does it. My camera came with an exhausted battery and no charger. No big deal, I had a charger and spare batteries from a similar model I owned, but dropped and broke. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Value Appreciator

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use, very sleek and attractive, very small and the macro and video are awesome!!! The only downfall which doesn't even bother me is a little almost high pitched noise in the videos I take but it's really not even a problem because it's not that noticeable especially if there are other sounds in the video. The HD quality is great and the macro is seriously awesome! WORTH THE MONEY! The creative slider is a lot of fun as well, I like being able to make my pictures B/W before I even take them. The zoom is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Nanan

customer_reviews.title: Best camera of this type
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of cameras, including a another Nikon and a Canon 50D. I bought this for my wife's use, but use it some myself, because it's so easy to stick in the pocket and shoot. The image quality is very good. The Camera is well made and the zoom range with minimal distortion for this camera type is great. I am satisfied, BUT, I hate the flash placement-I still find my finger on the top of the flash and I have to manually bring it up to position. I also dislike having to charge the battery in the camera. All considered, knowing what I know after using the camera, I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Owhatagoosiam

customer_reviews.title: Great Pix - Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I rarely buy anything as soon as it is out but I made an exception with this camera...Mistake...The flash on the camera is just where you tend to put your finger to hold the camera. It has to Pop-Up to work and your finger is exactly where the flash is. The camera does take exceptional pictures but the fact that they have done away with the view finder and the serious design flaw concerning the flash leads me to recommend you do not purchase this model until these things are addressed. Jim Palmiter Macon GA
customer_reviews.author: James E. Palmiter

customer_reviews.title: appears to be broken, and I have only had it less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: When this camera worked it took great pictures; however, after taking this on holiday with me it stopped working properly. On the close up setting the camera attempts to focus and refocus and never stops trying to take a clear picture. The other settings are working; however, the close up setting is faulty. I'm not sure I will purchase a Nikon again since I had my Kodak easy share camera for 11 years and never had a problem with it. This one is useless in less than one year.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S 8000
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about a month now and I really do like it, however, there is one thing that is very aggravating about it - the pop-up flash on the top. Most people hold digital cameras with their thumbs on the bottom and two fingers on the top. If you hold it like that, the pop-up flash cannot pop up and I've had to retake many pictures because of that. I'm trying to retrain myself on how to hold it and I'm sure I'll get used to it but I do think Nikon screwed up on this point. The macro setting is great ! The size is great, although a little bit heavier than others I seen.
customer_reviews.author: M. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Happy Snapper
customer_reviews.text: First I should mention that my husband and I each have fancy SLRs that we take on "photo shoots" so we are pretty picky about the quality of our shots. We are very happy with this little 10X camera. It is small enough to carry easily in my purse or in a small case on my husbands waistband. We just used it for a visit from the grandkids and, with no fuss at all, we were snapping shots that came out clear and crisp. That's what we bought it for and it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S8000 - Great compact digital
customer_reviews.text: So far all of the uses I have put this little camera through have been very satisfactory. Photos come out bright, clear and picture-true - video I have not used very much but the little I did appeared to be pretty good. Handy viewing when hooked up to LED TV with HDMI connection. The size and weight of the camera is really nice. Pretty much satisfies all for which I need a camera - photos, some video and emailing same to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Frances J. Porgal

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S8000
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with the ease of use of this camera. The images are sharp and clear. You can use manual settings but for the most part I find that the automatic settings seam to handle most situations on its own. The wide angle lens is great for scenery shots that I have taken. The zoom is incredible for a camea of this size. I would reccomend this for anyone who wants a great compact camera. I'm still playing with the video mode. I tried using it at a concert but the light conditions did not seem veem very compatable with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: the great Nikon Coolpix S8ooo
customer_reviews.text: I had the same model previously and the shutter stopped working and it did not pay to repair it. So since my chips were compatible with the S8000 I purchased the camera and love it,ecpecially in the color red.
customer_reviews.author: rita m birne

customer_reviews.title: The joys of owning a Nikon Coolpix S8000 14MP digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new camera, something small that would take great pictures and be a 'point and shoot'! There are many features on this camera that I don't use, so if you are looking for extras this will not disappoint you!! The one I decided on had a few extras like a charging cord..... I have not been sorry that I decided on this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Kersey

customer_reviews.title: best digi cam i've owned yet!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is much better than i've ever had with it's 14 megapixels. the image stabilization is superior and i am a person that has very shaky hands. the zoom is amazing without loss of clarity and focus. overall i am completely impressed with the camera and it is the best one i've had yet. i've used over 4 different digicams and this one overall for price, ease of use and image quality is the best! highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Vasallo

customer_reviews.title: Good vendor and product
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice camera however the flash has to pop up on the left side of it where you usually put your finger, so you have to get use to take it differently and the tripod space is on one side which makes difficult to leave it in the tripod. Besides these, take great pictures and video, zoom is awesome!! Vendor also great since it delivered on time and new as I requested. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ale P

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Small, easy, great photos... exactly what I wanted in a digital camera. My only complaint... and I have come to deal with this... is that the flash just happens to be where I am comfortable resting my finger. When the flash needs to go up, my finger was on it. But I have broken my bad habit. Now we're fine.
customer_reviews.author: jackie d

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera right before a trip to Italy the first week of June and it was wonderful. The camera is very forgiving for motion and every picture came out clear, even when riding in a Smart car around switch-backs on the road to Lago Maggiore! The zoom also works great and I was able to capture my kids first time up on waterskis over Father's Day weekend. Very intuitive controls (the trash button is great - I don't have to hunt through menus to get rid of a picture I don't want).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pics.  Issues after 12 months.
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my wife and it has worked like a champ until she took it on a vacation. Unfortunately it is not under warranty so it is $100 if I want it repaired. It got to where it would not turn on or would turn itself off in the middle of things. Granted I don't have a second battery to see if this is the problem but it does not appear to be battery failure from what the wife tells me.
customer_reviews.author: Markle Farkle

customer_reviews.title: Have a problem with the video
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a coolpix S8000 and am very happy with the pics it takes but have a problem with the video. I have it set on HD and after recording a video clip, and transferring it to my laptop,the camera records it as a quicktime video type. and windows 7 can open this now in windows media player. But when I play back the video, I can hear a cycling ticking noise from the camera I have no idea what this is and checked the manual but found no help. I am going to contact Nikon and if they can't help me, I may have to return the camera
customer_reviews.author: C. VanDyk

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! I actually bought my first one almost 4 years ago - knocked it off the counter and broke the housing - still worked beautiful until the battery cover came off. Nikon wanted around 350 to fix - which I would have done if I had not found this deal. I know Nikon has a newer camera out to replace this - but this is a awesome camera. takes beautiful pictures. Incredible quality. I will certainly use this until I wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Forgey

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Product was as described. The only issue was the corner of the camera was bent a little and the flash would not pop up on its on. I bent it back with a screwdriver and it works great now. Was a little dissapointed but not enough to contact the seller. In all I'm glad I bought it because it takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures, when it works
customer_reviews.text: Camera is coming up on two years old. Already been repaired under warranty for spontaneously shutting down, frequently - except it's still doing it. Plus, now the lens cover doesn't open, so when it goes on and opens, it takes good pictures--- but it doesn't often turn on and stay on, and sometimes when it does it doesn't matter because the lens remains covered.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Zaklow

customer_reviews.title: European version not for use in US
customer_reviews.text: This was a European version with no user manual and no warranty for repair in US
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for point-and-shoot use
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon S8000 is the first Nikon camera I have owned and I am most definitely impressed. The image stabilization is amazing along with many of the other features in the camera. Almost all pictures come out amazing so I really do not have many negative points on this camera. The one thing I do wish the camera had is more customizable settings (mostly shutter speed). The only thing that is manually adjustable is ISO and even that is a pain to adjust from the menu. Overall though, it is an amazing camera and highly recommended for anyone who can live without controlling every setting manually.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pevarnek

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality but the video is really bad...
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is very good, but no better than my old Nikon E4500 from 2003. There is no shutter priority or aperture priority, pretty much everything is in auto mode. That is really OK by me. But the real deal breaker is the video. It is shocking bad that it is totally unacceptable - lots of jerky motion. It is hard to believe it is that bad and yet Nikon let this slide. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: tested over time
customer_reviews.text: have traveled and taken many pictures. Auto focus is still new to me and I have learned some downfalls, like don't even think about taking pitures of fish swimming behind glass. Also, thinks in motion and remain in motion will generally not get let you auto focus. The camera is small and light enough to take around.
customer_reviews.author: lost4guam

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I keep charging batteries to replace so it will work. Almost 80% of the time it turns itself off anyway. How does this company sell such an inferior product. I feel like I was really dumb to buy it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: F. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Beyond disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is beyond a disappointment-a first, it would refuse to open intermittently-now, it has stopped opening or turning on altogether! Obviously, it is useless! At almost $300, this is an outrage, especially since Amazon does not accept returns after 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is one good camera. Very easy to to use. I think the picture quality is excellent and video quality is equally as good. If you need a camera for a vacation that will do everything you need from sunset to sunrise pictures, to portraits, to quick pics while moving and is small enough to fit in your pocket this is your camera. I recently return from a European vacation and bought his camera just for the trip and I was not dissappointed, it was great. I took over a 1,000 pictures and movies (HD movies)and was brutal sometimes on the camera and it performed great. The battery lasted and the ease of changing settings for different situations was great.
customer_reviews.author: draftmaster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera w/ a Bad Flash Placement
customer_reviews.text: By far, this is the best camera I've owned: picture quality is outstanding, the large screen on the camera is wonderful, and the movies it shoots are crystal clear. There are a couple of drawbacks though - the flash is in the worst possible location (it flips up right where you'd normally place your finger when shooting), and there is not a black & white photo option. Still, I love the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua White

customer_reviews.title: did not like.
customer_reviews.text: I got a lemon. This camera doesn't want to focus on close ups even in the close up option. I also ordered it in silver, and it came in black. I was unable to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Flash position inconvenient, but good otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Our Casio Exilim EX-Z4 finally died so we purchased this one as a replacement. On the Casio the flash is integrated (doesn't pop up) and the Nikon has a pop-up flash...right where we were used to holding the camera with our left hand. It will take some practice to get our hand out of the way to allow the flash to pop up, and also the Nikon Coolpix is a bit larger than the Casio Exilim, but otherwise the Nikon is a good camera with excellent zoom capability (better than the Casio).
customer_reviews.author: Dree-Dree

customer_reviews.title: Best Pocket Camera Yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best value in a combo hi rez pocket camera with HD video capability. Just too heavy for me and the 14 megapixel still images not much different than my 10 meg Nikon that weighs half as much. If the HD Vid is an important feature I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Altrnate

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix s8000
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, and the price made it even nicer. I'm going back to Asia where last time I lugged around a Nikon D40 with gear! This little baby takes great 14.2 megapixel shots, with zoom, and fits in your vest pocket!! Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Its a truely amazing camea, its great in many ways, from the wide angle of the camera, to the amazing 10x Zoom, to the numerous options it has along with the panoramic option that helps you take pictures to then on your computer connect them and make a panoramic picture!! Downfall all though, is that it does not have the view finder, when real sunny, your not able to see what your taking a picture of, but the more you use it, the more you get use to it, and know what will be in the picture, ive managed to get over it already though!!
customer_reviews.author: Borja

customer_reviews.title: Used model not great
customer_reviews.text: Battery on used camera charged slowly and didn't hold charge long. Broke easily.
customer_reviews.author: JT Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a month ago and absolutely love it. It is smaller and more compact than the Canon A560 I have been using for the past few years. I wanted something small enough to fit in my pocket and easy enough to get out. The 14.2 meg/pix photo quality is fantastic. The 3 inch LCD screen is exceptional. 10x zoom brings in far away subjects and the Macro is mind blowing. It will focus on things 1cm (0.4 inches) from the end of the lens. WOW! This is a great little camera that packs a lot of great features.
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Darnell

customer_reviews.title: great camera easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take on a trip with my mom and sister so they could take pictures with the push of a button. I picked the right one it is easy to use takes great photos almost as good as my Cannon Rebel XSI. The videos are amazingly clear.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Camera with an HDMI input
customer_reviews.text: I somewhat like it it does have an HDMI output but the camera is heavy and a bulky rectangle camera, but it works
customer_reviews.author: CDG Technical Writer

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures. It is really easy to use. The 10x Zoom is really great. But if you want a camera that takes great video too then i would pass on this and get the fuji FinePix F80. I really dont use the video feature so it doesn't bother me. There is a low hissing noise in all videos shot using the camera. I have no idea why. Overall Great point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Jugdip S. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nikon Coolpix S8000 for my technology challenged wife to take on a trip with one of her girl friends. It is very easy to operate and takes great pictures under all lighting conditions. I really like the small size of the camera and the 10x optical zoom is a big plus. This is our fifth or sixth digital camera and is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I like the big LCD screen & battery type (way better than having to use Double AA batteries). Easy to use. Takes great pictures. I upgraded my point & shoot camera, and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B-L

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a while now, and it takes BEAUTIFUL pictures! the zoom is very nice, but once passing the 2x zone, it's all digital, so gets blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: Just great pictures from such a neat little camera
customer_reviews.text: Just great pictures from such a neat little camera. It's lightweight, compact an nd accurate. I would have preferred a colour option.
customer_reviews.author: John Chidgey

customer_reviews.title: first nikon is a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: CONS:poor positioning of flash-poor positioning of stereo mics. would charge ONLY from factory 120v/usb charger or a computer with Nikon software installed; a real bummer if you need to recharge in the field. would not work with 12v/auto powered usb charger like my other usb devices. BIG TIME BUMMER, after three days it failed to turn on and would not take ANY type of charge. I'll try another brand! PROS:credit where credit is due. great pictures. excellent lens. LOW level light photography was surprising-almost like NIGHT VISION, poor quality but it produces images.
customer_reviews.author: jct

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It has VERY little shutter lag and the pictures look great. It is a compact camera with pictures that don't reflect what you would normally expect from a compact camera. You would expect less. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: suzyb1078

customer_reviews.title: Items included with camera purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that a small user-friendly owners manual was not included in the camera packaging. Also, this is the first time I have purchased a like camera where an AC adapter battery charger is not included. I was very disappointed when I opened the package and realized I needed to purchase this separately. The usb and cable system are very user unfriendly and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Cool pix camera
customer_reviews.text: I owned this camera once before and wanted another because it takes great photos. But, the one I received was clearly refurbished and pieced together. This was not in the description. The camera has trouble staying on and sometimes won't turn on when The power button is pressed. Very disappointed and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hrm

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S8000
customer_reviews.text: I have resisted the purchase of any digital camera until the S8000 became available. With the features and pricing of this camera you have the perfect blend of size, versitility and capability in a very intuitive electronics unit. Treat yourself to the joy you will experience with this camera. I can't imagine anyone being disapointed with this Nikon digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Newman

customer_reviews.title: I'm Letting the Rating Speak for Itself
customer_reviews.text: fantastic camera. I'm not really into writing the product reviews so adding this filler to satisfy the required number of works.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is GREAT! I have told many friends about it & one has purchased it on my recommendation. It has many of the features of my more expensive, complex camera.
customer_reviews.author: golffun

customer_reviews.title: Great so far, but I'll surely update as time goes by
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a few hours, but I learned something. You can charge it by USB cable with your computer, specifically, laptop. I was quite pleased by that. I'll update more as I use it more. Very happy in general. The Lowe Pro Santiago 20 works well with this camera. It fits one extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: camera review
customer_reviews.text: I found the camera takes a nice picture, but it is very slow to respond. It is slow I actually missed photo opportunities while waiting for it to decide to turn on. We take tons of action shots and use the sequence shooting. this camera would stop after, say, 20 shots! It has fewer shooting modes than I am used to having with the Casio and my older Nikon. I'm not going to return it, but won't recommend it either.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Koolpix S8000 review
customer_reviews.text: Our Kooplix S8000 camera has met all of our expectations. It is easy to use and it produces clear pictures of first-rate quality. We commend this camera to anyone looking for a cost-effective way to create quality pictures in a general photography setting.
customer_reviews.author: wlj2

customer_reviews.title: user-friendly and super functional
customer_reviews.text: We've always had Nikon digital cameras, and we bouth the S8000 as an upgrade of our old Nikon; wow what a difference. It takes great pictures, (I love the panoramic picture tool) and videos and the new accesories make it easy to download. I plugged-in the 8gb memory which is great because during long trip, I didn't want to worry about sufficient memory space. I am definitely sticking with Nikon for digital cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Celebi

customer_reviews.title: present
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter wanted a camera for Christmas. She got this one and loves it. A perfect present for her.
customer_reviews.author: V. Crotty

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The camera is for my mom and she absolutely loves it! She loves how even if she isn't completely still the pictures still come out clear!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: S8000 Cool Pix Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I decided to make this purchase for an upcoming vacation. The camera is easy to use (even for Man thumbs) and the photo quality is awesome. It's quite durable as well because a well meaning fellow vacationer who decided to take of group photo for us, dropped it on the ground and it is still working great. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: kelerin

customer_reviews.title: Flash in wrong spot
customer_reviews.text: The pop up flash is on the top left. This is where my left hand comfortably holds the camera. This prevents the flash from opening. It's a small thing and I got used to holding it differently. The screen also tells you in big letters the flash is not open. It shots great photos and is easy to program and use. The red color makes it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: capt

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix 8000 lives up to name
customer_reviews.text: the camera is rated number one by consumer reports and they were right. it is easy to use and takes great pictures. plus the 10x zoom is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: S. gannaway

customer_reviews.title: wonderful little camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this pocket camera. Great focal range and easily carried in a jacket pocket while ridingy Harley thru the Smokey Mountains. Great battery life. Got camera wet once. Put in sock with rice after removing batter and memory card.camera came back an still working as good as befoe
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Gripp

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix 8000
customer_reviews.text: great little digital camera. nice 10x zoom. really easy to use. would recommend you get the extra memory card. the orig. internal 32mb not enough. plus 'dial down' your pixel size if you want to store more than 8 shots. (the factory setting is set on max. pixels, which = 14mb per shot). we learned quickly when we started getting "Out of Memory" messages.
customer_reviews.author: kanfield1

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted...
customer_reviews.text: This camera starts up fast, has minimal shutter lag, and I can take one picture right after another! It's almost like using an 35mm camera with the benefits of digital.
customer_reviews.author: CorGeek

customer_reviews.title: Nikon's are great
customer_reviews.text: Very good deal. Got extra batteries and it works great. Looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this item to anyone. It lasted less than three months before it began to fail and finally quit all together just hours before our wedding day. We had to rely on friends and disposable cameras for pictures. This camera is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ITTTTTT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome photos awesome video and its eas to use any one could figure it out
customer_reviews.author: WickedWookie

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Good photos, easy to use, and plenty of pre-set scenes to make life easy. Its taken a lot of love and use from me and I have grown very attached to mine.
customer_reviews.author: querida

customer_reviews.title: Compact and highly functional.
customer_reviews.text: I still need to explore the features on this little jewel. I am not a camera buff. However, it will get the job done for 99% of the people and 100% of the time for me. GLC (great little camera).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The self focusing does not work very well; however, it is quite old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera in it's class
customer_reviews.text: It is very good camera among the compact cameras except the location of flash on the side is odd. I wish it was in the middle so the handling of camera would have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: K. ZUBAIR

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, but flash is hiding on top right corner so u might not be able keep ur fingure there apart from that it's a great camera in all respects I bought 2 both work great
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of these for work taking pictures of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these for work taking pictures of roof job sites. I have sent them out to repair at Nikkon after warranty expired for multiple $109.00 repairs of shutters
customer_reviews.author: ruderoofer

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: My old S8000 died after heavy use. I bought a newer model Nikon Coolpix but it was not as satisfactory--too slow, especially slow focusing . So I had to search for another S8000, too bad they have discontinued it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures. Excellent optical zoom. Video is good, but not ideal for that function. Camera is slightly larger than my previous compact camera, but worth the larger size to get the great zoom feature. Wish you could view pictures without the lens being open.
customer_reviews.author: J. Low

customer_reviews.title: too late to return it
customer_reviews.text: It is my fault for not trying the camera when i got it, but this camera is not working properly or at least not out of the box. my husband and i needed a camera for a coming vacation / wedding so we purchased this coolpix s8000. We got it and did not really use it. this past Halloween we took the camera to take pictures of costumes of people on the street and sadly out of bunch of pictures we took maybe five were not blurry. my next camera will be from a real store (bestbuy, walmar) and will be a point and shoot camera that won't cost more than 150 including 8.38 tax!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nikon out performed itself again. the zoom and the quality of the pictures are outstanding. I tried the video feature, but I need to work on how to make the sound higher, I guess I will have to read the manual
customer_reviews.author: Khaled A. Soliman

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The flash popup is ridiculously in the way of where one holds the camera. But the worst problem is not being able to see the photo you are trying to take when surrounding light darkens the monitor,
customer_reviews.author: zebra

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, we are not pro users. We feel it a little hevier than other in the category. And also a bit expensive point and shoot. No problem at all with the photographs.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E. Giura

customer_reviews.title: broke within 6 months-lens error
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed using this camera for 6 months and then received a lens error-the lens would not open. contacted amazon but never received a response from the company. very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Capps

customer_reviews.title: Amazing power in a compact camera!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable camera!Shot HD video of my brother' graduation and I was sitting across the arena! 10x optical zoom plus a 14.2 megapixel camera in a SLEEK design... WOW!! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: I. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera fo travelling and vacationing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very slick digital camera for the price. I used it during my Hawaii vacation and all the pictures and video clips turn out very good. The camera is easy to use. I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Enico

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Camera is conveniently sized for carrying on activities. Picture and video quality are excellent. Charging cord doubles as UBS cable for transferring pics to computer. Quick refresh rate for multiple pics. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: TNVOL

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S8000 Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera here because it was $30 cheaper than the others. When I got it, I discovered why... it did NOT have a memory card to save pictures on. That was my own fault I suppose for not reading all the features, but I assumed it was like the others in the list. I had to wait quite awhile before I could get the card so I was unable to take pictures when I thought I would. The internal memory would not save enough pictures for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: nikoncoolpix
customer_reviews.text: i received the camera on 12/18/11 it was not working, the lens cover did not closed the camera was returned with their approval on 12/19/11 as of today(1/9/12) I HAVE no answear
customer_reviews.author: ramon roman

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Had a chance to test it at home, and to take the camera on vacation. Easy to use and the 10x optical zoom is amazing. Great photos. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Kroeppel

customer_reviews.title: nikoncoolpixs8000
customer_reviews.text: My cousin bought one of these and I was so impressed I went on and line got one, too! This camera will do almost anything most amateurs want at a really affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Chalfant

customer_reviews.title: S8000 review
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I bought it to take with me on safari to Kenya. The picture quality and the 10X zoom were very good. I have not used the video function yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sanj

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S8000
customer_reviews.text: 10x zoom was the reason we purchased this camera. Our old 3x zoom Canon just didn't do the job. We are very pleased with the zoom and shutter response speed.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Gator

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Features on this camera is just what I was looking for in an automatic camera. Great display and pictures are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great. I love it. It takes clear, crisp pictures, and the zoom is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Local user

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use. It takes high quality photographs and really makes photography fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: False and Misleading Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I was told I was purchasing a New Nikon camera and after having issues with the camera not working we sent the camera back to Nikon. Nikon informed us that we had been sold a refurbed camera that Nikon had sold to Electrobrands. So we paid full price for a used camera and being told it is too late to be reimbursed due to it is past 90 days of purchasing. So don't believe everything you read from Electrobrands and Amazon. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: picture quality is bad
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not having picture quality that would expect at its price range. I saw that Nikon has come up with a new model Coolpix S8100, I think you can try that one. I hope there should be a lot more improvement in picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Akhilesh Aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: Love this Nikon!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, compact, I dropped it on the pavement ( made me so mad) and still works like a charm!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W. Lange

customer_reviews.title: do not buy it!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this camera in June and is already broken! the camera is not responding. i have to send it to Nikon for repairs; and by the way was made in China
customer_reviews.author: aherly

customer_reviews.title: coolpix 8000
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a month.The flash is located at the edge where you hold the camera which is inconvenint.The camera perfomes good.The door of the battery chamber opens spontaneously.The camera is light and compact to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Ramanather Sirithara

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S8000 14.2 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedFROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Nikon's super slim, clearly brilliant Coolpix S8000 combines 14.2 effective megapixels with an incredible 10x optical Zoom-Nikkor ED glass lens for stunning prints as large as 20x30 inches. The camera features an incredible, bright 3.0-inch High Resolution VGA (921-k dot) LCD for composing and sharing pictures and HD (720p) movies with stereo sound. The Coolpix S8000, with Nikon's EXPEED image processing concept and 4-way VR Image Stabilization System, takes incredible pictures, incredibly easy. The Coolpix S8000 has Nikon's New Smart Portrait System which; automatically detects your subjects face, takes a picture when they smile, can soften the skin tone, and warns you if they blinked. 

The world's thinnest 10x zoom camera that offers more creativity and freedom in photography 



The ultra-slim Coolpix S8000 is equipped with a precision wide-angle 10x zoom, Nikkor ED glass lens, 14.2 megapixel resolution, and a variety of advanced shooting functions including the Creative Slider. Its slim, attractive design enables photographers to creatively capture every moment in style. 

The Coolpix S8000 is the world thinnest* 10x zoom camera, offering a focal range of wide through super-telephoto to fully capture special moments from near or far. It also comes equipped with high-speed performance and a 14.2 megapixel image sensor to deliver exceptional image quality and consistently sharp results. 
* Among compact cameras equipped with an optical zoom lens capable of zooming in at 10x or more as of December 29, 2009 (according to research conducted by Nikon Corporation). 

Nikon Coolpix S8000 Feature Highlights 

EXPEED digital imaging technology 
Nikon's smarter approach to digital imaging technology. From image capture to processing, Nikon's comprehensive EXPEED digital imaging concept encompasses the entire picture-taking operation. EXPEED is much more than a processing engine; it is a revolution in digital photography. 

3-inch, 921k-dot TFT LCD featuring Nikon's Clear Color Display 
The high-quality 3-inch Clear Color Display for the Coolpix S8000 features an ultra wide-viewing angle, anti-reflection coating, and screen brightness adjustment. The vibrant 3.0-inch 920k-dot VGA display offers four times the clarity and detail of standard cameras for amazing image reproduction. In addition, the monitor's structure greatly reduces reflection and improves visibility outdoors for a more vivid, clearer image preview and playback. 




High-Definition movie recording 
Entertain audiences with movies that capture the impact of the scene with HD. The Coolpix S8000 can shoot up to 1.5 hours* of HD movies (720p) with sound at 30fps. HDMI output is also available for easy in camera playback on your TV or computer.
*Recording stops automatically after 29 minutes. This figure is based on in-house testing standards and stated for recording at 25°C with a fully charged EN-EL5 battery. Actual results may vary greatly depending on factors that include differences in ambient temperature, and the amount of zoom and autofocus operations used. 



Four advanced image stabilization features ensure sharper results 
VR image stabilization in action. The Coolpix S8000's high ISO 1600 capability allows shooting at faster shutter speeds, yielding great results even when shooting in low light or when capturing fast-moving subjects. Motion Detection assists in achieving sharper results by automatically controlling the shutter speed and ISO setting to compensate for subject movement as well as camera shake. New advanced flash control enables natural and beautiful flash photos even when subjects are backlit or when shooting telephoto by enhancing ISO sensitivity, rather than opting for slower shutter speeds. 



Nikon's Smart Portrait System with Skin Softening 
As part of Nikon's Smart Portrait System, a series of advanced functions help produce consistently great portraits. The Skin Softening function ensures smooth skin tone on the face of subjects by leveraging built-in face-detection technology. Automatically detecting as many as 12 faces in the shot, Face-priority AF helps produce satisfying portraits by adjusting focus and exposure. Smile Timer helps to faithfully record precious moments by automatically releasing the shutter when the subject smiles. Blink Warning alerts the photographer when it suspects that a subject has blinked, while the Blink Proof function shoots five sequential frames, then saves the one in which the subject's eyes are wide open. In-Camera Red-Eye Fix Red-Eye Fix automatically corrects perceived red-eye effect before saving the image to memory. 



Creative Slider 
The Coolpix S8000 is equipped with the Creative Slider, a fun new way to apply a rich variety of effects when shooting in Auto Mode. Adjust brightness, saturation and color tone using the Rotary Multi Selector. Adjustments can be previewed in real-time on the Coolpix S8000's 3-inch LCD monitor. 

Nikon Coolpix S8000 Other Features  * Macro shooting from as close as 1 cm (0.4 in.) 
 * High-speed performance 
 * 16 scene modes for optimized shooting in various settings 
 * Scene Auto Selector 
 * Subject Tracking 
 * Quick Retouch 
 * D-Lighting 
 * Auto Sort function 
 * Approx. 32 MB of internal memory 
 * USB charging via Charging AC Adapter EH-68P/EH-68P (AR) or PC 
 * HDMI connectivity 

What's in the Box  * EN-EL12 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 * EH-68P AC Adapter/Charger 
 * UC-E6 USB Cable 
 * EG-CP14 Audio Video Cable 
 * AN-CP19 Strap 
 * Coolpix Software Suite CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 14.2 megapixels for stunning prints as large as 20 x 30 inches
10x wide-angle optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens; 3.0-inch VGA (921k-dot) Clear Color Display
720p HD movie recording at 30fps; HDMI output
Creative Slider creates pictures, in camera, by simply adjusting brightness, vividness and color hue
4-way VR Image Stabilization System; Smart Portrait System

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars235 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
